name: Project Symphony
description:
- Submission for Global Game Jam 2022-

Inspired by rhythm games over the years, the likes of Dance Dance Revolution, Just Dance 4, Muse Dash, Osu (and so many more). 

Harmonize with your other self, and complete segments in sync! with our take on the genre, we tried to spice things up a little bit, which shall attempt to test the coordination of both hands!

We think that music can beckon a flow from within, which can challenge and eventually harmonize the dualities of our nature, producing a cathartic effect when everything falls right in place.

we hope you have a fun time!

We had fun as first-timers!

Music made with a lot of love by us

-Controls and mechanics-

  1. You play with the 'Directional Arrow keys' and 'WASD'. 
  2. Hit the key at the right time on the note. Points and feedback based on accuracy will be awarded.
  3. With every 4 succesful hits, a multiplier gets added and boosts your score. The number of succesful hits required increases with 4x increments, all the way to a x3 multiplier added to score.
